about.title: About Us
about.lead: Founded in 2025, Affiliated company of P.S.P. SPECIALTIES PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED.
about.b1: UPLIX is a professional learning and organization development partner specializing in Human Resource & Organization Development.
about.b2: We design and deliver practical, experience-based learning solutions that help individuals and organizations adapt, perform, and grow in a rapidly changing world.
about.b3: Our approach transforms knowledge into actionable experience, ensuring measurable impact at both individual and organizational levels.

experience.title: Experience-Based
experience.desc: Hands-on learning focused on doing, not just listening.

impact.desc: Clear before/after results with tangible KPIs.

one_partner.desc: Complete Learning + Safety + Waste in one place.

• 4-point ratchet suspension 
• Side accessory slots 
• No ventilation 
• Chin strap included

hep102.desc:

• Chin strap included
